Issue.creator: gennadyl
Issue.summary: Scalable network middleware to support efficient block dissemination.
Issue.description: Story: The separation of roles to different entities stemming from the new architecture introduces the issue of reliable dissemination of information to a large and dynamic set of peers within a byzantine environment. The prime initial communication pattern being supported by this epic is the distribution of new blocks, being produced by a set of orderers, to all the peers.
